channel.title: Random Client error, please help!
channel.description: Well recently I got a new tower and after managing to scrap what was left of my old one onto this one, I tried to run a client earlier and the CMD automatically closed down, I tried a 64bt run and win7 one, they both done the same.. I sorta need help otherwise I can't continue my server. :\

item.title: Random Client error, please help!
item.dc:creator: @_J_ava [J]ava
item.description:
@_J_ava wrote:

how would I turn it into a exe file?

Managed to get a slight image of the error…

But my client has a Gui inside of it… Mind helping?

Read full topic

item.title: Random Client error, please help!
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Turn it into an exe file. Get a Bat to Exe converter and your problem will be solved.

Read full topic
